original_title: Manhattan: Pearl Street - New Chambers Street
text:
(1)
416-414 Pearl Street, at and adjoining the N.E. corner of New Chambers Street. Structure shown at the apex, No. 416, is a frame building. Also shown is New Chambers Street eastward. Note the Second Avenue Elevated on New Bowery.

1932

J. Clarence Daview Collection, Museum of the City of New York

(2)
A more inclusive view, showing two sides of this triangular block that has a base on New Bowery ("El" structure thereupon). These structures in View 2 have been rehabilitated by the present owner, Louis Bigolet.

March 11, 1938

P. L. Sperr

(3)
A view showing solely the low corner buildings enumerated in View 1.

October 1, 1938.

George D. Chinn
